name: A Chama Aprisionada
description:
The Imprisioned Flame

A small game i made for the 1-Map Challenge at RPG Maker Web forum.

In this very short game, a boy has to save an elemental that has been imprisioned by a wizard.

At the beginning, you can choose the language (default is Portuguese). Once chosen you cannot change it again.

Stats:
1 map
3 variables
2 switches
7 events
1 item/weapon
1 actor
0 common events
